backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing user profiles, habit library, activity entries, patterns, programs, and access control with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping features to related files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain-text JSON-style mapping of frontend file paths to descriptive summaries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base style setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell loading the React application root and main script.
Utility module computing emotional trends, spending triggers, time distribution, and insight signatures from entries and patterns.
frontend/src/analysis/detectPatterns.ts: Scans text for predefined keyword categories, calculates confidence scores, and returns pattern matches with snippets.
frontend/src/analysis/patternTypes.ts: Defines pattern metadata including IDs, titles, and descriptions for different behavior categories.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling authentication, error fallback for canister resolution, and switching between main views.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal for entering and saving a user's name during initial profile setup with form validation.
frontend/src/components/common/AccessDen: Displays a sign-in prompt when the user is unauthorized, featuring branding and a login button.
frontend/src/components/common/CanisterR: Shows troubleshooting guidance when the app cannot resolve a canister ID, with refresh and external link actions.
frontend/src/components/entries/AddEntry: Form for adding a new activity entry with text, source selection, optional image upload, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntriesL: Lists user entries with sorting, previews, and navigation to entry details or adding new entries.
frontend/src/components/entries/EntryDet: Displays detailed activity entry info, loads and renders optional image attachments, and provides navigation and analysis actions.
frontend/src/components/habits/HabitLibr: Fetches or seeds a habit library and renders habits grouped by category inside an accordion UI.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Renders the public landing page with hero content, login button, and a copyable live URL display.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Provides the main app layout including header, navigation, content area, footer, and live URL copying.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Shows an onboarding dialog explaining app steps and capabilities with a dismiss action.
frontend/src/components/patterns/insight: Displays aggregated emotional trend percentages and overall balance, with fallback when no data exists.
Shows time-of-day activity percentages with bars and highlights peak period, including a no-data fallback.
Summarizes spending triggers with totals, averages, trend direction, and peak day, plus an empty state.
frontend/src/components/patterns/Pattern: Loads patterns and entries, computes insights, and displays a dashboard with summaries and analytic sections.
frontend/src/components/patterns/RunAnal: Button that runs detectPatterns on entry text, saves patterns via mutation, and shows loading and toast messages.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramD: Renders details for a specific program day including task info, rationale, reflection, and user check‑in data.
frontend/src/components/program/ProgramV: Manages program generation, automatic updates based on insight changes, and displays day details or overview.
frontend/src/components/today/ProgressSu: Displays a 30‑day program’s completed days, current streak, and average mood using check‑ins.
frontend/src/components/today/TodayCheck: Renders the daily check‑in form, loads existing entries, and submits updates while showing progress and program state.
frontend/src/data/habitLibrary.ts: Defines a static library of habit templates grouped by category with metadata like duration and difficulty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login, and identity persistence using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for profiles, activity entries, patterns, habits, and programs with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and loads global styles.
Computes summary statistics for recent behavioral patterns, including counts, confidence averages, and snippet aggregation.
frontend/src/program/generateProgram.ts: Generates a 30‑day habit program by ranking categories from patterns and insights, then assigning habits with contextual explanations.
frontend/src/utils/liveUrl.ts: Builds the canonical live URL based on host rules and provides a helper to copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings, hash routes, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, shadows, breakpoints, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and deployment‑related feature requirements for resolving live URL errors.
